page.title: 12Sport in Aston Clinton
page.content: The Aston Clinton Swimming Club is held at Green Park on Tuesday and Friday.It is an indoor heated swimming pool. For safety's sake only forty people are allowed in the swimming pool. Gym Club is held on Monday and Friday.It commences at the school hall.On Monday there are two sessions. The 2nd session is for the best.On Friday, 8 people go. The age group is 5 to 12. Football club is at weekends. There is an under 10,12,14 and mens' team. The league is for every team. The cup is a knock-out competition. The mens' team is called Aston Park Rangers. The younger team is called A.C.Colts. It is at Aston Park, a public recreation ground.
